      • getColor

        public java.awt.Color getColor(java.lang.String element,
                      Tool tool)
        Specified by:
        getColor in interface ColorModel
        Returns:
        the color for the specified graphical element when representing the specified tool. If the element is unrecognized this method will return a default color.

      • getColor

        public java.awt.Color getColor(java.lang.String element)
        Specified by:
        getColor in interface ColorModel
        Returns:
        the color for the specified graphical element not linked to a specific tool. If the element is unrecognized this method will return a default color.
